thread.title: Cubs outfield crushes baseball; LeBron James snaps selfie for adoring fans
thread.title_full: Cubs outfield crushes baseball; LeBron James snaps selfie for adoring fans

title: Cubs outfield crushes baseball; LeBron James snaps selfie for adoring fans
text:
Ben Dowsett | Posted Oct 8th, 2015 @ 11:16am 
— Welcome to From Left Field! Here are three sports stories worthy of your clicks this Thursday morning. 


— Daren Willman (@darenw) October 8, 2015 

n his career, but it's virtually impossible to say he's not an entertainer with a good heart. During the Cleveland Cavaliers' preseason home game against the Atlanta Hawks, it just so happened LeBron was perfectly positioned to take a selfie for a group of young fans. Who would he be to refuse such a perfect circumstance? 


The Millford Mighty Mites are here to fight back. 

Idea to increase the NFL's likability, inspired by the Mighty Mites: between plays in the first through third quarters, a minimum of two players from each team are required to dance to catchy music for 15 seconds or more. Failure to do so results in a 15-yard penalty. You're welcome, Roger Goodell.
